title: Leo and Cancer Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: Good communication is the key to this partnership.
steps.content: Good communication is the key to this partnership. Leo’s ruling planet is the Sun, while Cancer’s is the Moon; in other words, the lion is used to being in the middle of it all, while the crab prefers to follow their own rhythm. Open, honest, and authentic communication helps these signs stay on the same page, so they can easily revolve around each other. Leos want to dramatically express their love and have it returned. At the end of the day, Cancer wants the same thing. Wondering if Cancers and Leos are romantically compatible? Check out what users have to say on wikiHow’s “Cancer and Leo compatibility in relationships” forum !

steps.title: Leo’s intensity can contrast with Cancer’s tender-hearted instincts.
steps.content: Leo’s intensity can contrast with Cancer’s tender-hearted instincts. True to their element, Leos are often ruled by fire, passion, and everything hot—especially when it comes to intimacy. As sensitive water signs, Cancers don’t share these same desires and goals in the bedroom, and prefer to take things one step at a time. Compatibility Tip: Before things get too hot and heavy, sit down together and look for a way to satisfy both of your desires. Figure out what your deal-breakers are, and see if there’s a way you both can meet each other’s needs without venturing too far from your respective comfort zones.

steps.title: If love comes first in the relationship, trust will come easily.
steps.content: If love comes first in the relationship, trust will come easily. Sure, Leos love the spotlight while Cancers prefer to stay behind-the-scenes. Beyond these differences in self-expression, though, are 2 warm, loving souls who want nothing more than a loving and devoted partner. If that foundation of love exists in the relationship, neither sign will have trouble trusting the other.

steps.title: Cancers express emotions gently, while Leos express them boldly.
steps.content: Cancers express emotions gently, while Leos express them boldly. Leos love being in love, and want everyone (and their mother) to know it. Romantic profile pictures and status updates are practically Leo’s M.O. Cancers, on the other hand, prefer to share their love in a quiet, private, and more intimate way. Compatibility Tip: Figure out if your partner’s love language is physical touch, quality time, receiving gifts, words of affirmation, or acts of service. Love languages are a great way to connect with your partner in a way that’s meaningful to them. [2] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source A Cancer’s love language might be quality time, since they enjoy spending one-on-one time with their partner. Reader Poll: We asked 893 wikiHow readers who've dated Leos, and 70% of them agreed that the best romantic gestures are thoughtful gifts and bold declarations of love. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Cancers value privacy and domesticity, while Leos value their social lives.
steps.content: Cancers value privacy and domesticity, while Leos value their social lives. Both Cancers and Leos are perfectly content spending time at home together, especially if the crab is showering the lion with love and attention. But while Cancer is happy to fill their schedule with this tender, private quality time, Leos often long for social time of their own. The ultimate extroverts of the zodiac, Leos feel most refreshed and content when spending time with others. Compatibility Tip: Make a weekly schedule that meets both of your social needs. Tuesday and Thursday night can be special date nights at home, while Friday and Saturday night is a chance for Leo to go out with friends.

steps.title: Leos and Cancers don’t usually see eye-to-eye.
steps.content: Leos and Cancers don’t usually see eye-to-eye. In any given topic or discussion, there’s a good chance that Cancer and Leo will both choose opposing sides. These different opinions definitely aren’t bad, but it can make it hard to have a productive, enriching conversation. Compatibility Tip: Try exploring topics that you don’t usually talk about! Even if you both disagree, it’s more fun to explore new horizons than it is to stick with the same sore topics.

steps.title: Love conquers all in a Leo-Cancer relationship.
steps.content: Love conquers all in a Leo-Cancer relationship. Domestic Cancer and social Leo might struggle to find some middle ground at first, but their strong love and loyalty for each other can bridge any gaps between them. With plenty of open communication and compromise, a Leo-Cancer pairing can very well be a match made in heaven.
